question: [File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/translated_v1_event/mod.rs] [Schema: TranslatedV1EventSchema] [Cross-Schema Consistency] If the same V2 event is indexed in both TranslatedV1EventSchema and EventByVersionSchema, are updates atomic across schemas to prevent inconsistency? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/translated_v1_event/mod.rs] [Schema: TranslatedV1EventSchema] [Query Performance] Can attackers craft queries targeting specific Version/Index ranges that trigger worst-case RocksDB performance, degrading indexer responsiveness? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/translated_v1_event/mod.rs] [Function: encode_key()] [Thread Safety] Are encode_key operations thread-safe when called concurrently by multiple indexer threads processing different transactions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/translated_v1_event/mod.rs] [Schema: TranslatedV1EventSchema] [Write Amplification] Can high-frequency event translation create write amplification in RocksDB, degrading performance or causing compaction storms? (Low)
